content.text:
Built in 1939, the Huron, Ohio lighthouse construction resembles that of ships built at the time, with riveted steel connections.  It’s taken a pounding over the decades and still looks great and solid!  Picture taken at dawn on 3/18/21.

If we all could make a tiny bit more effort and not leave our human waste on the ground or in the water...carry an emergency toilet option while traveling: Dry John toilet bags.  Just put the bag in a container and you’ve got your own toilet. Any container 5 gallons or less, even a  small cardboard box will work!

Dry John toilet bags are designed to be kind to nature. Our bags are compostable. The media inside the bag is organic and helps solidify human waste. Human waste is a solid form that is easier to transport and carry out. Human waste is better deposited in a lined landfill than scattered about the ground or deposited in the water. Can you help us help nature?

title.text: Dry John Toilet Bags - Made in Ohio!

content.text:
Love Ohio’s nature too?

Let’s encourage  sportsfisherman on Lake Erie to carry an eco-friendly emergency toilet  option: Dry John toilet bags (Made in Ohio!). Just put the bag in a  container and you’ve got your own toilet!

Dry John toilet bags  are designed to be kind to nature. Our bags are compostable. The media  inside the bag is organic and helps solidify human waste. Human waste in  a solid form is easier to transport and carry out. Human waste is  better deposited in a lined landfill than scattered about the ground or  deposited in the water. Can you help us help nature?

content.text:
Scenes from Huron, Ohio on Lake Erie at sunrise 3/12/21.   Happy to see an adventure van parked this morning at our lake front  park! 

If we all could make a tiny bit more effort and not leave  our human waste on the ground or in the water...carry an emergency  toilet option while traveling: Dry John toilet bags.  Just put the bag  in a container and you’ve got your own toilet. Any container 5 gallons  or less, even a small cardboard box will work!

Dry John toilet  bags are designed to be kind to nature. Our bags are compostable. The  media inside the bag is organic and helps solidify human waste. Human  waste in a solid form is easier to transport and carry out. Human waste  is better deposited in a lined landfill than scattered about the ground  or deposited in the water. Can you help us help nature?

Dry John toilet bags work for truckers!  Any container 5  gallons or less can become your personal toilet - even a small cardboard  box!

Dry John’s toilet bags are made from corn and contain  natural media to help absorb liquids and odors.  Just deposit them in  the garbage when done.  Easy!

node.excerpt: Dry John toilet bags work for truckers!  Any container 5  gallons or less can become your personal toilet - even a small cardboard  box!

content.text:
First off, thank you dear ladies for patronizing Dry John toilet bags and caring so much for the welfare of the environment! 

Dry  John toilet bags are made from corn and contain natural media to help  absorb liquids and odors.  Just deposit them in the garbage.  Easy!

The 8 gallon toilet bags fit 5 gallon bucket toilets nicely - but just about any smaller container will do!
